name: Project CW
storyline: In a world teetering on the brink of nuclear Armageddon, there’s only one force precise, mobile, and mighty enough to save it: The Mobile Tank Group. Team up for the journey with these elite Agents, each with their own arsenal of devastating abilities, and fight in covert ops across the globe, pushing back the tide of destruction.
summary: Project CW is a free-to-play high-octane tank combat game set in an alternate Cold War era. Command a diverse roster of Agents and their unique vehicles, from iconic to experimental. Team up and engage in cinematic battles packed with adrenaline and armoured might!
